channel.title: SwiftBar Releases
channel.description: Most recent SwiftBar releases (not test builds).

item.title: SwiftBar 1.0.2
item.description:
New: Added "Send Feedback" menu item which opens issues page in this repository

Option to hide SwiftBar icon from the menu

Fixed: Script output parsing

Fixed: Image retention in the menu bar

Fixed: Separator not showing in submenus correctly

Fixed: Parameters `refresh=true` and `bash=...` don't work together

Fixed: Default menu font size

Fixed: Plugin Repository is not showing if plugin folder is not selected

Fixed: Donâ€™t allow set /Application folder as plugin folder

Fixed: Invert font in menu bar when selected

item.title: SwiftBar 1.0.1
item.description:
Fixed: Template Images not Displaying

Improved: Changing plugin folder reloads plugins automatically

Improved: Not time plugins, i.e. `plugin.sh` run one time on launch(technically every 100 days)
